choices: A performance downtown.
A practice session.
Their first televised performance.
A party celebrating their most recent performance.
Crystal's apartment.
1.content: Local punk rock sensation Total Breakdown is about to live up to its name. The question is, where does everything begin to go wrong?
1.title: Setting the stage.

choices: Her clothes
The stage lighting/special effects
A crazy fan/fans
The bandmates
The weather
11.content:
(Chapter originally by doragom333)

"Crystal! We're on in 5!" Crystal's manager shouted.



"A'ight!" Crystal shouted back, turning away from the dressing room mirror and picking up her guitar.



She wasn't too worried about tonight though. Every performance was the same as the last. Play those killer riffs, belt out the usual lyrics, all just another day in the life of Crystal, lead guitarist and singer of local punk-world sensation Total Breakdown.



After strumming some chords, seeing that everything was in tune, she slung her guitar over her shoulder and proceeded to walk out the door, stopping for a moment to pose in one of the full-length mirrors.



Crystal took great pride in her stage persona and outfit, an ensemble she had been wearing at every performance: a purple and black shirt with the sleeves ripped off, also purposely torn in places revealing a form-fitting fish-net shirt underneath, followed by a dark blue/black pleated skirt underneath, finished off with some lacy purple stockings worn at uneven lengths, and some black stiletto heels for some emphasis. In fact, she had been wearing this specific outfit for so long that the clothing was starting to get worn down and raw in some places. But Crystal didn't care about that, they still worked just fine. She was there to play and put on a show like always.



And so she got on to the outdoor stage, got the cue, and began to perform. However, halfway into the first song, something began to go wrong with-
11.title: A performance downtown.

choices: A spark from the pyrotechnics catches her skirt.
The stage lights get turned up to max.
The smoke from the dry ice machines overtakes the stage.
112.content:
It was business as usual for the most part; they were halfway through 'Disaster in the Air' when things started to go wrong. As far as Crystal knewshe hadn't done anything to piss off the roadies. She was pretty sure that they were still raking in tons of money too, so she didn't think it was a matter of using cheap equipment. Every other show so far had gone just fine, so it wasn't like there was a precedent for technical failure.

So with all of that going for her, imagine Crystal surprise when...
112.title: The stage lighting/special effects

choices: A cloudless rain began to take hold.
It began to snow.
A thunderstorm was coming in in.
115.content:
The band started the show with ‘Shotgun Shockers,’ a song off of their newest album. It was selling well and the song itself was a mild hit but Crystal thought the track wasn’t their best work. Amiee, however, would vouch for it and the couple songs similar to it on the same disc; saying that ‘Shotgun Shockers,’ while still being upbeat and punchy, would ease newcomers into the band’s antics and allow Crystal to conserve her energy for later. The guitarist had been known to go crazy with the first song and nearly be out of breath by the second. Some of the crowds seemed to like the raw feeling it gave but the rest of the band felt their performances needed to become more professional. It was probably for the best. I can always rock out later. In fact, I’m pretty sure people are expecting me to.

The blue-haired girl continued to softly sway her hips to the music when...
115.title: The weather

choices: Slipped on a puddle and ripped her skirt.
Took off her over-shirt to wipe her guitar.
Other
1151.content:
The blue-haired girl continued to softly sway her hips to the music when a light drizzle began to take hold. Funny enough, most of the clouds were far off in the distance but the wind was carrying it to the arena. The lead guitarist stopped for a brief second to take in the sight but continued to power through the song.

Crystal was foreign to this type of weather, as were her bandmates. She never gave much of a thought about how a near cloudless rain might feel like but the current sensation was invigorating. The cool winds and the sun battled it out while water seemingly continued to fall down from a clear blue sky. The mind of the blue haired girl didn’t know whether to make heads or tails on how it felt but Crystal didn’t really need to use her mind on this matter.

Three songs later and the freaky weather was still as strong as ever. Crystal was loving it and so was the crowd: dancing, cheering and screaming what the lead guitarist assumed was the lyrics to the song they were playing. She didn’t want to think about it but the blue haired girl felt her band was failing to meet the level of excitement coming from the crowd. Sure, she could tell that they were having a good time but security had already positioned themselves to contain the frenzy below and the sun was still out. This concern wasn’t really about competing with her audience, while her wishes did entail doing just that, but wanting to keep the people entertained and proving to them that Total Breakdown was as wild as they were.

Slightly consumed with thought, Crystal...
1151.title: A cloudless rain began to take hold.

choices: Worried that the crowd's excitement is waning, she tries to move fast again.
Feeling timid, Crystal moves behind Aimee to signal her to step forward.
11511.content:
Crystal rocked her head to the music and heard the cheer of the crowd. The sound sent excited chills through her mind that sent her hopping and playing hard, left, then right. She moved closer to the crowd as she jumped, but her left heel did not hold. A small puddle had formed in a dent along the stage floor, and she slipped sideways. Agile as she was, she turned her hip to move with it, her fingers somehow still playing the tune. If anything, it almost looked planned. Only she noticed the small feedback as the bottom of the guitar tapped the ground.

Wanting to keep the energy in her small dive, she sprung back to her feet, but as she did, pushed her weight down on her guitar for balancing help onto the heels. As she swung her left leg up, she felt a hem give way.

The skirt was pleated, and when she stood up it was not particularly noticeable, however a slit now formed from the front-left side of her left leg, all the way from the bottom to just a inch below the waistband. The pleats folded over the seam, but she immediately felt conscious about what would happen if she moved too quickly to the left. To make up lost time, she bounded herself to the right, fearing moving a direction entirely. She knew, however, she could not spend a whole performance standing still, or never moving left. As an experiment, she gave a small jolt of her hip to the left with a step, looking down to see just how bad it would be.

The part did not fully appear up to the edge, but the pleats did part enough to show far past her stocking and up the side of her leg. She was at an awkward angle to look, but she was fairly sure no underwear was on display, and so decided to attempt to carry on with the same fervor as before. She did hear with that hip jolt a small swell from the crowd, and felt a flush in her cheeks. Was it because some of them noticed?

She realized she was becoming far too distracted from the performance - the real purpose of being here. Now slightly more wary of her surroundings, she attempted to carry on as she did before, though ground was still a bit wet, and her clothes still quite old.
11511.title: Slipped on a puddle and ripped her skirt.

choices: Crystal tries to keep the skirt up by keeping her stances wide.
Crystal decides to wait till the end of a song before fixing the buckle.
115111.content:
Truth be told, Crystal was unsure whether or not water made clothes stronger or weaker. She thought of sweaters and how it shrunk-

She shook her head and belted out more lyrics. She had to keep focus, because the crowd was excited and she was not. She had to keep them going, to match their enthusiasm at any cost. Anyone could be watching, after all, that could affect their careers forever! She could not let them down.

She rocked. She danced. She moved and thrust herself as fast as she did before. She felt a slight extra weight on her clothes, but no chill from the brief rain at all - she was moving too much for it.

There was the bit of apprehension, though, she still had that kept her from jutting out with her left leg. If the split was visible, it was not bad, however. Certainly it was not. It couldn't be.

She realized her thoughts were distracted again, and moved even harder, jumping in the air (putting her guitar against her skirt to keep it from flaring up) and landing on her knees. As she did, she felt something off the moment she stood back up. No one except her had really noticed, but as she pressed her guitar against her skirt, the end of it slipped against the waist line of her skirt on the right side - the side with the belt buckles for her skirt. Her movement pushed the buckle back, and her jolt up in the air slipped the prong loose.

The skirt sat loose, once placed underneath her fishnet and shirt, just half an inch below her belly button, but now was sagging just one more inch to the tops of her bony hips.

No one in the crowd could see, but Crystal was all the more nervous. If she moved too much without keeping her legs apart, the skirt could slip down further. If she focused on too much awkward movement, she could easily fall, however.
115111.title: Worried that the crowd's excitement is wani...

choices: Crystal tries to still be energetic, despite her skirt and the slippery floor.
Crystal watches the ground too much, and ends up walking into an amp.
1151111.content:
Crystal's skirt wobbled at the width of her hips, so she attempted to keep her pose wide and proud. She found this strange, as she typically would jump and sway with her knees closer together. Either that, or being so conscious of her stance now just made every step feel uneasy.

She still tried to keep the crowd going. They were ecstatic - crazed with each wave of bravado between her voice and hands. Each leap make half the audience jump in the air. She knew another jump would jostle her skirt a bit, but she just went half a minute without it budging at all - she decided she needed to keep the audience going. All she had to do was land with a wide stance.

She tried to imagine gymnasts. They often landed with their legs together, though, which would not bode well for her. She attempted to land with her feet a bit in front and behind her, around shoulder length apart.

The skirt immediately plummeted. She gasped at that, a slight mistake into her microphone, and knelt just slightly. The skirt did not fall all the way, but now sat below her prominent hip bones. Her light blue panties could be seen above them, though still slightly covered by the black shirt she wore. She continued to play, clearly distracted, and wondered what her band mates were thinking she was doing.

She now realized her skirt was much heavier than it was. The rain did that, and it also wet the rest of her fairly well. Everything she wore was at least a bit wet, and sitting downward. Her top was still entirely fine, and she knew she had to stand.

She stood up a bit slow, and tried to make it seem she did it for effect in the song. The effect seemed more sultry than she intended, but she decided that was not an inherently bad. Her hips stuck to the side prominently, and she almost rolled to a standing position. Her skirt pressed down against the tops of her thighs, and almost an inch of her panties were visible. From the front, both her guitar and the bottom of her black shirt kept it well covered, although from the back Aimee's eyes were drawn to the hint of light blue, bouncing and bounding to the beat of the song.
1151111.title: Crystal tries to keep the skirt up by keeping h...

choices: Crystal decides to try and slip off her panties under her guitar and hide them.
Crystal negates the fear of tripping on them and moves normally.
11511111.content:
The skirt did not seem to be going down any further, and Crystal took that as a safer sign. Her hips and thighs were not wide, but did have enough angle and curve to them to prevent them from sneaking down any further. Nothing was noticeable, at least from up front, and so she did not care. She moved and she jumped. A bit of her leg showed as the slit of prominent, but why did that even matter? It was hardly anything. She had a more important thing to focus on.

Already she was getting out of breath. Perhaps she had panicked too much for those moments and forgot to breath, but she was losing energy by the end of the song. She moved to stage left and continued, deciding to remember to signal Allison to wait a few extra seconds for her to catch her breath.

She remembered she was supposed to avoid this part of the stage. It dipped down slightly with uneven floor boards, and that was why they did not space out as large. She immediately began to move back with the end of the song now happening, and slipped on a small pool of water that formed right before the stage regained its true altitude.

She landed on her butt on the edge, which gave a short sharp pain up her tailbone. The crowd was unsure if it was just another move for the climatic end, but her band mates were looking, a little worried. Crystal looked to Allison, who gave her a quizzical look in return. Crystal shook her head, indicated she needed a few moments, so as the crowd still cheered and waited, Crystal knew she had a few seconds. She began to slide up and stand, but felt a strong pull, and stopped.

Her panties caught against the unfinished, revealed edge of the floor board. When she slid upward, they rode down, strained in stretch, and she might have felt a vibration. Maybe it came from the crowd reverberating the stage itself, but she was unsure. It was well localized to her waist. The elastic might have gone.

Her skirt was still on, of course, but it was no longer tight, which meant if the elastic did go, her panties could fall almost any moment. That would be a larger issue in terms of moving around, as well as even trying to keep still.
11511111.title: Crystal tries to still be energetic, despite he...

choices: The rocking causes a rope to pull a suspended light, making it fall and startle.
The rocking causes Crystal to trip.
115111111.content:
Crystal did not want to risk the panties falling noticeably on stage, or tripping over them. She decided to wiggle here while most could not see exactly what she was doing, and she took her left thumb and pulled down at her panties. As she thought, it slipped off all too easily, the elastic far gone.

She stood back up slowly, bending and moving while thinking of each motion. She decided not to get too close to the edge of the stage - now would be an awful time. She pulled on her skirt to get it up some, but it fell back down. It really was riding low, and she could not fumble the buckle back without making it obvious. She glanced under her guitar at what was on show, and realized her guitar did not completely cover all of her exposed hip. She adjusted her strap down just slightly to help. Now, the skirt was low enough to show the beginning of the bikini bridge between her hips below her toned stomach. Aspects of exposure were fine, but only if she controlled it! That, and exposing herself without panties was a bit farther than she ever wished.

She moved back up front to prepare for the next song, and noticed someone at the side of the panties in the crowd was now pointing at the dent, seeing something. Her mind flashed in horror and worry, afraid more would now take note. The man then tried to move up the stage, clearly trying to grab for it despite it being several feet across the stage, and security made their move downward to stop him. More of the crowd took notice, as there was a ruckus and no song. The crowd did not quite yet know why a kerfuffle was happening, but it was clear something was. The bumping of the people moving against the stage to see, as well as the extra bodies moving hard across the faltering area of the stage caused the entire area to move - the cheap equipment even shaking.
115111111.title: Crystal decides to try and slip off her panties...

choices: Wanting to be safe, they wait for security to mop and remove the light.
Continuing on, Jen, Aimee, and Crystal move stage left where ground is dangerous
1151111111.content:
As the stage rocked, the janky equipment began to feel the effects. A rope in the back kept one of the film colored lights in place just above the center of the stage, used to accentuate their looks when it became darker and the songs a bit slower. Since the usage of the stage was a bit condensed, both Jen, Aimee, and Crystal were fairly close to the light when it fell.

The crash was insurmountably loud, and even caused feedback in their microphones. A lot of the audience groaned and looked among themselves, the band members, or simply shut their eyes hard as if it would help. The shattered glass ended before it reached any of Total Breakdown, however Crystal was closest to the fall, and jumped backward into Aimee. Jen was incredibly startled and simply fell on her back, though did manage to make sure no damage happened to her bass. Allison was furthest back, and while she jumped a little, was otherwise unphased. The song did end, however, and people in the crowd grew a bit silent in wonder. Security should have come out to check on the girls, but they were busy pulling back the man who climbed on stage.

The jump rode the slit on the right side of Crystal's skirt up, exposing her leg as it was bent upward in its entirety. Her skirt itself was folded upward a bit, and the bottom hem barely was long enough to cover between her legs as it draped. Her back was pressed against Aimee, who had fallen with Crystal. Aimee apologized at first and tried to back away from Crystal, but held just a moment. It was kind of nice to have Crystal lean against her like this. Instead, she just sat up slowly.

Crystal sat up as well, rather cushioned and fine. She slid down from Aimee a bit, and felt herself a bit attached. As Aimee looked down, she noticed the back of Crystal's fishnet shirt had interlodged itself in the buckles of her large belt. Aimee was a bit startled and confused at first, and tried to move back from Crystal, which only made Crystal fall back, her back pulled into Aimee's thighs. There was the sound of a tear of the fishnet, and Aimee felt her own belt tug at her long pants, riding them down just a bit off her left hip.

Crystal reached behind her and gave a small chuckle as she dislodged the shirt from the belt. She was not completely sure what it was attached to, but she was sure she was free, and stood again, looking back to see if Aimee was alright. The rip on the back of the fishnet shirt was rather small, and in the center of her back.

Aimee, all the while, stared at the length of what she considered a perfect leg, bending and then standing in its entirely so close to her. When Crystal asked if she was alright, she just nodded, and stood up quickly. The movement, though, drove her belt and pants a bit further down her hip. She normally kept her pose inward and reserved, and as such, the pants slipped another half inch lower before Aimee noticed more than Crystal's leg.

Jen was in a different situation. Her hard hit on the ground caught her thong against one of the floorboards. As she stood up, even slowly, she felt the thin garment snap. Wary of her own situation, and while most attention was in between the two band mates interacting, she stuffed the ends of the thong under the folds of the waist line of her low pants, not wanting it to really be noticed. Seeing a thong was fine, but seeing some loose strands of elastic sticking up seemed a bit gross. As she stuffed the ends of her thong out of sight, the pressure pushed her own pants lower. The back was designed to be higher than the front, but it was low enough to show just the top crease of her butt, and along the front and sides her pants were as low on her as the skirt was on Crystal, now showing the beginning hint of her mound. For Jen, though, it was hardly noticeable, but she did feel her chest a bit more loose. She could not really check, but she thought perhaps something had happened to the laces on her bodice. The ties would be fine, though, surely, and it might have just knocked a little loose from the fall. She shrugged it out of mind.
1151111111.title: The rocking causes a rope to pull a suspended l...

choices: Crystal moves to her band mates, but bad luck seems to rub off...
Crystal tries to use a small break in the song to retrieve scraps of her shirt.
11511112.content:
Moving while keeping her head down, she stepped and strutted. The song was nearing its end, but she decided to be careful for a few moments. She could fix her belt a little in a bit, after all, and things would be better. Looking too closely at the ground exactly where her feet landed, she was not watching completely where her feet were going.

Her foot bumped into an amp at the last chord, and on instinct she wanted to stick her hands up in defense, though remembered her guitar. Instead, she tilted her body so her back would hit the amp. There was a clumsy clunk and some feedback, but it blended into the noise of the end of the song just fine. People cheered and jumped, and Crystal, a little winded from the events of the last song, needed to match them. She jumped up with the crowd and moved back toward the center of the stage, but felt, this time even heard, a rip.

The rips of her shirt got caught against the edge of the old amp. Most of the back of the shirt, and a good portion of the front, simply came off. It was already old, as well as ripped. There were the straps over her shoulders still, and enough down her front to cover her light blue bra, though her back was exposed aside from the fishnet shirt. She kept her pose a few moments, unsure what to do. Exposing the back of her bra was not that bad of a thing, but now only her guitar was hiding the fact her skirt was riding the top of her thighs.

She looked behind her to her band mates and saw Aimee a little alarmed, and Allison was giving a quizzical look. She was asking a question with her eyes and Crystal, not wanting to let them down, just nodded. She did not know what it all meant, but Allison gave a smirk, satisfied.

Allison clicked off her sticks to the beat of the next song, and Crystal immediately had to play. Why was she doing this? Did she not notice? Surely the freshly ripped shirt would have given away something was amiss. Crystal did not even have time to fix her skirt now, and her attire was not quite as well attached to her as Jen's.

Then again, Crystal did just nod, and both Allison and Jen had said Crystal was too energetic on stage, and something could happen if she got carried away. How could she help it, though? The crowd was so very intense.

There was still plenty of the set left, however.
11511112.title: Crystal watches the ground too much, and ends u...

choices: The laces on Jen's corset begin to snap apart.
Aimee's heavy belt begins to drag her pants down.
Shockingly, Allison experiences troubles with her outfit behind the drums.
115111121.content:
It was going to feel odd, ignoring the temptation to lose herself to the enthusiasm of the crowd and do her usual performance routine, but Crystal knew that she'd be making a big gamble if she kept on doing what she'd been doing. Carefully watching the floor, Crystal backed up to be closer to the rest of her bandmates. This allowed her to keep the audience from seeing her shirt's severe damage in the back and her exposed bra straps while also bringing everything closer in to keep the audience's attention on the band as a whole.

It seemed like a terrible waste of all that stage space, but that seemed to be the only real answer to the situation. Of course... there was always the possibility of Jen or Aimee stepping up and amping up the crowd with their own performances. The energetic act was normally Crystal's domain, but she knew the rest of the band had seen it more than enough times to have a general idea of what the audience was expecting. All it would take was a subtle hand signal for the other girls to get the message and hopefully step up.

Crystal continued to focus on her guitar work, but couldn't help wondering why she seemed to be having such awful luck with her outfit tonight. One or two minor things could be written off as a coincidence, but the seemingly constant mishaps her wardrobe was experiencing seemed less like coincidence and more like some kind of curse. Of course such a notion was nonsense, curses weren't real and luck was just an abstract concept to justify coincidence... right?

Rationally that made perfect sense, but the events that were soon to follow in the wake of Crystal's signal to Aimee and Jen would seem to defy rationality and firmly support not only the idea of bad luck, but that it was contagious. Crystal's outfit soon ceased to be the only one experiencing difficulties, as...
115111121.title: Crystal moves to her band mates, but bad luck s...

choices: Crystal moves to Aimee to try and get her to hook the bra back on.
Crystal ignores this and uses the adrenaline for her show.
115111122.content:
Crystal knew the songs incredibly well, and she knew that there was a moment she normally pumped her fist in the air for just three or four seconds. It was a bridge given to Allison's drums, and she could take advantage of it and at least remove her shirt off the amp itself. It looked tacky, if not embarrassing, where it was.

She did only have a few seconds, so she had to move quickly. She was glad, though still uneasy, to feel the skirt had found a stopping place at the round of her thighs. There was a bit of underwear showing, but it was not too bad. She made it half way through a song and things had calmed down. Things could have calmed down, but was that was Crystal wanted for the show?

Crystal moved to the front of the amp, off to the side of the stage and out of the way. It seemed like a normal progression, since now focus would be on Allison. She waited for the right time, and then quickly turned to try and pull off the bits of the shirt, but her feet slipped as she went, and once again, she fell into the amp.

This time, there was not a layer of cotton to stop its cheap plastic edges. It bit into the fishnet, and as she staggered to get back up, she noticed she was quite stuck. In a quick panic, she reached her hand behind her back and ripped whatever was attached to the amp and stood up.

It was still on her back and away from the crowd, but she noticed what was wrong: she had undone her own bra. Combined with that the fishnet was ripped from the small of her back down the path it scrapped the amp, even the form-fitting fishnet was not covering much from her back to her right hip. Her bra was still on, however, and even covered in front due to the bit of shirt she had left, but as she moved she felt it jostle and shift.
115111122.title: Crystal tries to use a small break in the song ...

choices: Aimee misunderstands Crystal and removes the bra entirely from the back.
Aimee understands Crystal and reattaches the bra.
1151111221.content:
Crystal backed up toward Aimee as the song reached the second half. Aimee had a short reprieve of playing, but Crystal did not. In fact, it would be confusing to be so close to her when she was not moving, but still, Crystal needed help.

Aimee was confused as well. Crystal was usually on the forefront of the stage, and did not spend much time back with her. Now, though, something might have been slightly amiss. Crystal's clothes were a bit looser, as well as a bit more in tatters. Was she stripping? She always was doing a lot for the show, but this was not exactly planned. Still, here was Crystal, the top of her light blue panties showing above her skirt. Her back was nearly bare - even her bra was undone.

Crystal shook her back toward Aimee to try and signal something, but Aimee was unsure what it was. She only had a few seconds, herself, to decide what Crystal wanted, but it seemed to be a focus on her bra.
1151111221.title: Crystal moves to Aimee to try and get her to ho...

choices: As the crowd riles further, another rain brews overhead.
The wild crowd convinces Crystal to dance more. The concert is everything!
11511112211.content:
Aimee's mind went nuts. Crystal was stripping, and moving toward her to help? She was not sure what exactly was happening, and could not believe was she was looking at. Seeing Crystal's back this close was not exactly new, but it was never in any sort of intimate way. Except now wasn't intimate. Was it? It was passionate, if anything. She had fantasized about this very thing, though this was admittedly a sort of strange way to achieve the fantasy.

Aimee clipped off the straps from behind, and pulled the bra out sideways. As she did, Crystal snapped around with a crazed, "WTF?!" face. The light blue bra was clearly visible from the crowd, and they came up with a huge cheer. Aside from the top of Crystal's ripped black shirt and half of her form fitting fishnet, her back was bare, and her skirt low enough to show some of her panties. As Crystal whipped around to look at the audience with her guitar close to her chest, they could see her shirt was still up front, in various ripped loops that draped over her chest rather well. Underneath that was still the fishnet, see through enough to see her skin tone, and fitting tightly around the top of her stomach, and on up.

The shirt was ripped and loose, so too much jumping could be bad, even if the fish net was well put together. Exposing some skin for the crowd, not even all too much skin a bikini would not show, was not that horrible, but Crystal needed at least a semblance of control to be comfortable!

The crowd, though, was even more wild than before. More and more people noticed the show they were at, and more and more they believed this was all part of the act.

All this aside, when Crystal looked back to see Aimee with the bra in her hands, quickly lowering it to the ground to continue playing, she did look a bit cute and flustered.
11511112211.title: Aimee misunderstands Crystal and removes the br...

choices: Crystal dives to her knees and covers up!
Crystal plays it off, puts her guitar in front of her, and slides the skirt on.
115111122112.content:
Crystal danced! She rocked and moved. She lead the pack now of the hundreds before her, and she felt it. She felt excitement across her body, and she rallied across the stage, everyone's attention peeled directly to her. She felt the skirt and the shirt jiggle, but decided to ignore it. It was fine - this was what was important now.

The song ended, and with the final run of a chord of her guitar, she lifted her hands outstretched, the guitar up with it. People were yelling, pulling out phones, everyone focused on her. It was intoxicating.

Crystal looked down. Her skirt had fallen, now loosely crumpled on the ground by her left leg. With it, her panties pulled down just slightly to the left, low enough to show a deep V and the top curve of her mound. While rocking her body, her shirt tatters flipped up over her shoulder, displaying the fishnet that formed, wet and taut, over her chest. At a distance of the crowd, it might have been hard to tell, but the fishnet was loose enough to see skin tone, and perhaps the hints of small protruding nips between the threads.
115111122112.title: The wild crowd convinces Crystal to dance more....

choices: Crystal keeps the guitar close and continues to dance. At least it was exciting!
Crystal tries to take Aimee's shirt now. Aimee usually wears two layers.
11511112212.content:
Aimee got the picture pretty easily: Crystal was having some issues with her wardrobe (it was rather old, and she was always sort of worried something would happen), and needed help during her pause. It was only a few seconds, but she thought it might be enough.

Her fingers, though, fumbled as she moved. She did imagine before messing with Crystal's bra, though not really in a situation like this, and not quite so much putting it on. The mere thought of touching Crystal's bra made Aimee all the more nervous, and her fingers staggered some. She pulled and pushed on the back of the bra in her fixing, and noticed she had clasped in some of the fishnet shirt. She decided to quickly fix it, grabbing the fishnet to pull out, but then Crystal jumped forward again.

Crystal had thought Aimee was done. She could not see, after all, and it felt all secured once again. When she moved forward, however, there was another rip. The already ripped fishnet continued to pull off, removing all of it across her back, now sitting in Aimee's stunned hands. Crystal's bra was indeed back on, but now the rest of her back was revealed aside from the bra, the very top of her fishnet shirt at the back of her neck, and the very top of the loop of her shirt. She looked out the window next to her and noted she was outside, and it was morning. Knowing they were once at Aimee's she looked outside to see if perhaps her house was close by. There was no luck. Someone, hopefully not herself, had driven the bus halfway to Crystal's apartment before stopping at the side of a residential road.

She heard a buzz, and looked frantically for her phone. She found it underneath a seat and put it to her ear. "H-Hello?" She said. The voice responding cut into her headache.

"Hey, Crystal! Where you at?" It was Allison.

"In the bus." Crystal groaned.

"On my way?"

Luckily, Aimee was fast at responding. "You insisted you could get back yourself, since you would need the bus to get to the garage today. Did you not remember? Are you alright?"

15.content:
Crystal's walls were covered in both thin patterned tapestries and pinned pictures from music magazines. She never bothered much with frames aside from a few key posters from more legendary concerts she had gone to. Her room was rather black and white, with the occasional splash of purple and red. She had a copious amount of pillows along a large couch in her smaller living room, but that was mostly it, leaving the rest of the area with propped instruments she rarely used in her own home. They were a bit loud, after all, and she found her own apartment being used a bit more for storage than play. She had a humble kitchen and bathroom (a bit smaller a bathroom than she ever hoped) as well as her own bedroom in a similar style to the living room, but with a sizable bed. She had an extensive wardrobe across her closet, and numerous art supplies stuffed in a corner.

In comparison to her band mates' living spaces, hers was easily the smallest. It was fine, however, because many of her things were kept in their practice garage space - she simply spent little time at home. On occasion people had crashed here, but otherwise her nights were only social when she went out - which she did often. Her returns were alone, but they were the only times she could work on her songs, for just an hour or so as she woke up, before the rest of any dozen of projects she had started.
